short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Upfront theme development easier by displaying element and region outlines/borders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome Extension for Upfront theme development that allows you to toggle a darkened background with highlighted element, group, & region borders.

This is for the Upfront WordPressTheme by WPMU DEV.

FAQ

Why can't I toggle the extension on?

This happens if you install the extension while you have the Upfront editor loaded. Refresh your page. (don't forget to save your edits first)
